name: March of the Rabbits
description:
How to play:

  • Press the correct buttons on the bottom of the screen to gather carrots
  • Use the carrots to deploy/upgrade 4 different units
  • March your rabbits to destroy your opponent

Strategies:

  • The swordsman is weak to the spearman
  • The spearman is weak to the archer
  • The archer is weak to the swordsman
  • The mage is weak, but damages multiple targets

Credits:

  • Coding: Lee Tran
  • Graphics: Lee Tran
  • Music: James Rajaste
